title: Turn off Grammarly's browser extension in a text field
content:
If you want to turn off Grammarly in a particular text field, hover over the Grammarly button in the lower-right corner of the text field and click the power button:
Youâ€™ll then see options to turn off Grammarly until the next visit or turn off Grammarly forever.
